item.title: The MacRumors Show: Apple's Big Plan for 5 New Vision Products
item.description: On this week’s episode of The MacRumors Show, we discuss Apple’s roadmap for new Vision headsets and smart glasses over the next few years. Subscribe to The MacRumors Show YouTube channel for more vid
